job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Scale is a tech-driven direct-to-consumer company that builds and deploys next-generation CPG brands in the beauty, health and wellness industries. Through our proprietary eCommerce and digital marketing engine, Scale transforms consumers’ end-to-end online shopping experience while increasing brand loyalty and retention. Scale’s growing portfolio of five brands and 100+ products helps hundreds of thousands of people live healthier lives.
We are searching for a Site Reliability Engineer to join our growing Engineering team. You will design, build, and maintain internally critical systems which integrate with various open source and closed source tools. This position will be accountable for the overall reliability of services running in our cloud production environments. The successful candidate will have a deep understanding of systems engineering and automation, including configuration management, containerization, and scripting.
Sample Responsibilities
Develop, configure, and deploy tools for cloud based systems and services
Deliver high quality, scalable, and resilient solutions that are documented and well-tested
Identify opportunities and implement solutions to further automate platform builds and processes
Build strong technical rapport with other cross functional teams while being the subject matter expert to lead projects in an Agile environment
Containerize new and legacy applications
Enhance, modify or debug developer code as needed
Requirements:
2-5+ years of DevOps/SRE experience in a tech forward environment
Demonstrated innovative contributions in system architecture
Experienced with highly scaled out, consumer-focused services and platforms, primarily focused on core infrastructure and software delivery
Experience building deployment automation within AWS-hosted services and infrastructure
Experience with scripting languages such as Python, GoLang, Javascript
Solid understanding of containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, or ECS
Expert knowledge of automation and best practices related to CI/CS pipelines and associated tools such as Jenkins, Bamboo, etc.
Why You Should Join Scale:
We are passionate about harnessing technology to drive business results. We collect and process large amounts of data to inform business decisions on a daily basis. As part of our Engineering team, the SRE has the unique opportunity to help drive innovation and technical excellence into all aspects of our proprietary platform.
This is a newly created position within a growing tech start up and an excellent opportunity to take the next step in your career.
What We Offer:
Work from home + Monthly WFH stipend
Competitive Salary Commensurate with Years of Experience
Excellent Medical, dental, vision and life insurance
401K match
Gym Membership
Generous Paid time off
